SELECT /* prItmBase.getGoodsItemList */ PGB.GOODS_NO , PGB.GOODS_NM , PGB.SALE_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR005',PGB.SALE_STAT_CD) AS SALE_STAT_NM , PGB.MODL_NM , EEB.ENTR_NM , COALESCE( (SELECT STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG T WHERE T.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_LRG_CTG_NO),'') || COALESCE('>'||(SELECT STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG T WHERE T.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_MID_CTG_NO),'') || COALESCE('>'||(SELECT STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG T WHERE T.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_SML_CTG_NO),'') || COALESCE('>'||(SELECT STD_CTG_NM FROM PR_STD_CTG T WHERE T.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_THN_CTG_NO),'') AS STR_CTG , PIB.ITM_NO , LTRIM(((CASE WHEN PIB.OPTN_NM_1 IS NULL OR PIB.OPTN_NM_1 = '' THEN '' ELSE '/' || OPTN_NM_1 END) || (CASE WHEN PIB.OPTN_NM_2 IS NULL OR PIB.OPTN_NM_2 = '' THEN '' ELSE '/' || OPTN_NM_2 END) || (CASE WHEN PIB.OPTN_NM_3 IS NULL OR PIB.OPTN_NM_3 = '' THEN '' ELSE '/' || OPTN_NM_3 END) || (CASE WHEN PIB.OPTN_NM_4 IS NULL OR PIB.OPTN_NM_4 = '' THEN '' ELSE '/' || OPTN_NM_4 END) || (CASE WHEN PIB.OPTN_NM_5 IS NULL OR PIB.OPTN_NM_5 = '' THEN '' ELSE '/' || OPTN_NM_5 END)),'/') AS ITM_NM , PGB.STK_MGR_YN , PIB.STK_QTY , PIB.DISP_SEQ , PIB.ITM_SALE_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR005',PIB.ITM_SALE_STAT_CD) AS ITM_SALE_STAT_NM , PIB.SOUT_NOTI_YN , PIB.SOUT_NOTI_STD_QTY , PIB.LGC_ITM_NO , CASE WHEN PISS.SOUT_CAUS_CD IS NOT NULL THEN FN_GET_CODENAME('PR032',PISS.SOUT_CAUS_CD) ELSE '' END SOUT_CAUS_CD , PGPH.SALE_PRC , CASE WHEN PISS.HIST_STR_DTM IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(PISS.HIST_STR_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd') ELSE '' END HIST_STR_DTM , PGB.DELI_PROC_TYP_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR008',PGB.DELI_PROC_TYP_CD) AS DELI_PROC_TYP_NM , CASE WHEN PISS.ITM_SALE_STAT_CD = '20' THEN PISS.SYS_REG_ID ELSE '' END SOLD_USER_NM , SUB.USER_NM , PIB.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(PIB.SYS_MOD_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SYS_MOD_DTM , PIB.ITM_SALE_STAT_CD AS HIDDEN_ITM_SALE_STAT_CD FROM PR_GOODS_BASE PGB , PR_GOODS_PRC_HIST PGPH , PR_ITM_BASE PIB , PR_ITM_SALE_STAT_HIST PISS , PR_STD_CTG PSC , ST_USER_BASE SUB , ET_ENTR_BASE EEB WHERE PGB.GOODS_NO = PGPH.GOODS_NO AND PGPH.HIST_END_DTM = TO_TIMESTAMP(#{historyDtm}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND PGB.GOODS_NO = PIB.GOODS_NO AND PISS.GOODS_ITM_GB_CD = '20' AND PIB.GOODS_NO = PISS.GOODS_NO AND PIB.ITM_NO = PISS.ITM_NO AND PISS.HIST_END_DTM = TO_TIMESTAMP(#{historyDtm}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND PGB.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_CTG_NO AND PSC.MD_ID = SUB.USER_ID AND PGB.ENTR_NO = EEB.ENTR_NO
AND PGB.GOODS_NO LIKE #{goodsNo} || '%' -- 주문번호 AND PGB.GOODS_NM LIKE #{goodsNm} || '%' -- 주문번호
AND PGB.GOODS_REG_DTM >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}||'000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') -- 상품등록일 AND PGB.GOODS_REG_DTM <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}||'235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') -- 상품등록일
AND PSC.MD_ID LIKE #{userId} || '%' -- 담당MD , 필수아님
AND PGB.STD_CTG_NO LIKE #{stdCtgNo} || '%' -- 표준분류 AND PGB.SALE_STAT_CD LIKE #{saleStatCd} || '%' -- 판매상태 AND PIB.ITM_SALE_STAT_CD LIKE #{itmSaleStatCd} || '%' -- 딘픔핀메싱테 AND PGB.DELI_PROC_TYP_CD LIKE #{deliProcTypCd} || '%' -- 배송처리유형 AND EEB.ENTR_NO LIKE #{entrNo} || '%' -- 협력사 AND PIB.SOUT_NOTI_YN LIKE #{soutNotiYn} || '%' -- 품절알림여부
AND PIB.STK_QTY <= #{stkQty}
AND PIB.STK_QTY < PIB.SOUT_NOTI_STD_QTY
mapper.select: SELECT 'TOTAL' AS CD, /* prItmBase.getGoodsItemSaleStatus */ COUNT(*) FROM PR_ITM_BASE WHERE GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo} UNION SELECT CD , CASE WHEN GOODS_NO IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(*) END AS COUNT FROM ST_STD_CD SSC LEFT OUTER JOIN PR_ITM_BASE PIB ON (PIB.ITM_SALE_STAT_CD = SSC.CD AND PIB.GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo}) WHERE GRP_CD = 'PR005' GROUP BY CD , GOODS_NO

SELECT GOODS_NO/* prItmBase.getGoodsItemBaseList */ , ITM_NO , STK_QTY , LGC_ITM_NO , ITM_SALE_STAT_CD , SOUT_CAUS_CD , SOUT_NOTI_YN , SOUT_NOTI_STD_QTY , OPTN_CAT_NM_1 , OPTN_CAT_NO_1 , OPTN_NM_1 , OPTN_NO_1 , OPTN_CAT_NM_2 , OPTN_CAT_NO_2 , OPTN_NM_2 , OPTN_NO_2 , OPTN_CAT_NM_3 , OPTN_CAT_NO_3 , OPTN_NM_3 , OPTN_NO_3 , OPTN_CAT_NM_4 , OPTN_CAT_NO_4 , OPTN_NM_4 , OPTN_NO_4 , OPTN_CAT_NM_5 , OPTN_CAT_NO_5 , OPTN_NM_5 , OPTN_NO_5 , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_ITM_BASE WHERE GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo} ORDER BY ITM_NO

SELECT GOODS_NO/* prItmBase.getPrItmBaseInfo */ , ITM_NO , STK_QTY , LGC_ITM_NO , ITM_SALE_STAT_CD , SOUT_CAUS_CD , SOUT_NOTI_YN , SOUT_NOTI_STD_QTY , OPTN_CAT_NM_1 , OPTN_CAT_NO_1 , OPTN_NM_1 , OPTN_NO_1 , OPTN_CAT_NM_2 , OPTN_CAT_NO_2 , OPTN_NM_2 , OPTN_NO_2 , OPTN_CAT_NM_3 , OPTN_CAT_NO_3 , OPTN_NM_3 , OPTN_NO_3 , OPTN_CAT_NM_4 , OPTN_CAT_NO_4 , OPTN_NM_4 , OPTN_NO_4 , OPTN_CAT_NM_5 , OPTN_CAT_NO_5 , OPTN_NM_5 , OPTN_NO_5 , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_ITM_BASE WHERE GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo} AND ITM_NO = #{itmNo}
